report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
- Rear Bumper: There is visible damage to the rear bumper area. The paint appears chipped and scratched, indicating impact or collision.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage is primarily cosmetic, affecting the paint finish on the rear bumper. There are no structural damages to the bumper itself, but the paint damage suggests that the vehicle may have been involved in a minor collision or scrape.

**Recommendation:**
- The recommended course of action would be to repair the chipped and scratched paint on the rear bumper. This can typically be done through touch-up painting to restore the original finish of the vehicle.

**Conclusion:**
- The vehicle has sustained cosmetic damage to the rear bumper. No structural damage is apparent.

**Prepared by:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Attachments:**
- Photographs of the damage (not included in text).

**End of Report.**
